page.title: 03TELFORD,THOMAS
page.content: {Thomas Telford}built the Chirk Aqueduct and he was famous for building hundreds of Aqueducts and Bridges and Canals.He got up at 7.OO a.m. every morning all the year {round.In May of 1810 Telford was asked by a local committee of wealthy gentlemen to make a survey of how the work should be undertaken to build a canal system.He designed at least five of the bridges along the canal and many of the Locks.{He died in 1834}of a chill. {The Canal Basin}is now used by many Narrow boats and tourists from all over the world come to{TREVOR There is a local Restaurant at the side of the canal called{THE {TELFORD.
